channel.title: first on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in first on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Spotify Car Thing is a $90 thing that plays Spotify in your car (2 minute read) Spotify has released its Car Thing dashboard smart music player.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook or PC (4 minute read) The first Android 13 Developer Preview built for Pixel phones includes two Cross Device service apps dedicated to connecting Pixels to other devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-28
item.description: Apple will reportedly allow iPhones to accept contactless payments (2 minute read) Apple may soon be rolling out a feature that will let small businesses accept payments using their iPhones without any extra hardware.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-23
item.description: Google Voice now lets you decide who goes to voicemail (1 minute read) Google Voice can now be configured to forward calls to a linked phone number or voicemail.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-03
item.description: Google is making its first in-house smartwatch that could launch in 2022 (3 minute read) Google could be launching its first smartwatch in 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-01
item.description: Elon Musk tells SpaceX employees that Starship engine crisis is creating a ‘risk of bankruptcy’ (3 minute read) SpaceX could face bankruptcy if it cannot achieve a Starship flight rate of at least once every two weeks next year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-19
item.description: Apple reportedly wants to launch a self-driving EV in 2025 with a custom chip (3 minute read) Apple has reportedly accelerated its timeline for Project Titan, its secretive autonomous electric car project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-10
item.description: Netflix tests a TikTok-style feed for kids (2 minute read) Netflix is testing a new feed on its iOS app designed for kids.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-29
item.description: Facebook Connect: all the news about ‘Meta’ and Mark Zuckerberg’s VR dream (1 minute read) Facebook has rebranded as Meta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-16
item.description: How to Watch the World’s First All-Civilian Spaceflight Aboard a SpaceX Ship (3 minute read) Inspiration4 is set to launch on September 15.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-26
item.description: OnlyFans says it will no longer ban porn in stunning U-turn after user backlash (1 minute read) OnlyFans has suspended its plans to ban pornography.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-04
item.description: Facebook will host a paid movie premiere this month (2 minute read) Facebook will host the premiere of The Outsider, a documentary about the National 9/11 Memorial and Museum in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-03
item.description: Google Tensor debuts on the new Pixel 6 this fall (3 minute read) Tensor is Google’s first custom-built System on a Chip specifically for Pixel phones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-20
item.description: Peloton plans to launch an in-app video game where you pedal to control a rolling wheel (2 minute read) Lanebreak is Peloton’s new in-app video game that involves riders changing their cadence and resistance to meet goals and control an on-screen rolling wheel.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-13
item.description: Tesla launches initiative to build first solar neighborhood in Austin (3 minute read) Tesla, Brookfield Asset Management, and Dacra recently announced an initiative to bring a large-scale sustainable neighborhood to Austin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-22
item.description: Apple Developing a Whole New Kind of MacBook Air (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new high-end MacBook Air.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-04
item.description: Waymo’s driverless taxi service can now be accessed on Google Maps (2 minute read) Waymo One can now be accessed and booked through Google Maps.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-31
item.description: Nvidia is making a 3D map of the universe with the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer (2 minute read) Nvidia’s Perlmutter supercomputer is the fastest in the world for AI workloads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-21
item.description: Snap’s new Spectacles let you see the world in augmented reality (4 minute read) Snap has unveiled its first true augmented reality glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-06
item.description: Facebook takes on Nextdoor with Neighborhoods tool (3 minute read) Facebook is rolling out a new feature called Neighborhoods in four US cities and Canada.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-29
item.description: Netflix’s new ‘Play Something’ shuffle feature is here to solve your movie night indecision (1 minute read) Play Something is a new feature for Netflix that automatically suggests new shows and movies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-06
item.description: Yahoo Answers will be shut down forever on May 4th (3 minute read) Yahoo Answers will shut down on May 4.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-05
item.description: Personal data of 533 million Facebook users leaks online (3 minute read) Personal data from 533 million Facebook accounts was recently leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-01
item.description: Apple adds two brand new Siri voices and will no longer default to a female or male voice in iOS (3 minute read) Siri will no longer default to a female voice in English.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-31
item.description: Snap Plans Hardware Push With AR Spectacles, Drone (1 minute read) Snap’s next-gen Spectacles will be able to layer Snapchat lenses onto the surrounding environment without using a smartphone’s camera.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-29
item.description: Google is testing Memory, an upgrade for Assistant to ‘save and find everything’ (2 minute read) Memory is a new feature for Google Assistant that uses a digital locker to store things like to-do lists, notes, reading lists, images, and more.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-23
item.description: Apple’s HomePod mini reportedly has a secret temperature and humidity sensor (2 minute read) Apple’s HomePod mini smart speaker has a secret temperature and humidity sensor in its casing.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-22
item.description: Samsung imagines how its first AR glasses might look in these leaked concept videos (2 minute read) Samsung recently showed off a basic set of image-projecting goggles at CES 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-04
item.description: Myanmar internet providers block Facebook services after government order (2 minute read) Internet providers in Myanmar blocked access to Facebook and its related services after military leaders seized power in a coup.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-02
item.description: Apple releases Chrome extension for iCloud passwords (1 minute read) Apple has released iCloud Passwords, an official iCloud Keychain Chrome extension for Windows and Mac.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-17
item.description: Amazon wants to scan your body to make perfectly fitting shirts (2 minute read) Amazon recently unveiled a brand called ‘Made for You’ that makes custom-fitted clothes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-14
item.description: Embrace your inner yellow blob with Headspace’s new Netflix meditation show (1 minute read) Headspace has announced a three-series deal with Netflix called the Headspace Guide to Meditation.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-16
item.description: SpaceX successfully launches second crew to space on first operational mission (4 minute read) SpaceX has successfully launched a second crew into orbit inside its Crew Dragon spacecraft.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-13
item.description: Chipotle to open its first digital-only restaurant as online orders soar (1 minute read) Chipotle Mexican Grill will open its first digital-only restaurant on Saturday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-10
item.description: McDonald’s confirms creation of McPlant plant-based burger, unveils new Crispy Chicken Sandwich will debut in 2021 (6 minute read) McDonald’s announced a new plant-based burger and a new Crispy Chicken Sandwich during its virtual investor update on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-09
item.description: Kombucha was just the beginning. This designer wants to create a bacteria-based food industry (2 minute read) Plurality Now is a conceptual restaurant that offers a menu of food derived from bacterial cultures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-06
item.description: WhatsApp now lets you post ephemeral messages that disappear after 7 days (4 minute read) WhatsApp users can now mark messages to disappear after seven days.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-07
item.description: Apple’s ‘Hi, Speed’ iPhone 12 invite sparks speculation: Midnight Blue, 5G, AirTags, more (2 minute read) Apple has sent out invitations for its ‘Hi, Speed’ event on October 13th at 10 AM PT.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-24
item.description: Tesla suffers complete network outage, internal systems and connectivity features down (2 minute read) Tesla suffered a complete network outage earlier.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-07
item.description: Driving the Polestar 2, the first electric car with a brain by Google (8 minute read) The Polestar 2 is a new luxury electric vehicle from Volvo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-20
item.description: Palantir to relocate headquarters from Silicon Valley to Colorado (2 minute read) Palantir Technologies is relocating its headquarters to Denver, Colorado from Palo Alto, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-24
item.description: Elon Musk reveals Boring tunnels as he aims to eliminate city traffic (3 minute read) Elon Musk has revealed renders of the first commercial station being built by his tunnel-digging company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-23
item.description: Tesla’s next Gigafactory is being built in Austin, Texas (2 minute read) Tesla reported its fourth straight profitable quarter in a row with a GAAP net income of $104 million, qualifying it to be listed on the S&P 500 market index.
